lines.text: Once again, Mr. Hardin, we're going to go on with this all night, until you agree to answer all of our questions.
[a bunch of soldiers are holding Sandra hostage, demanding she tell them where Hardin is]
[Hardin shoots all the soldiers and escapes with Sandra]
I did not kill Rodriguez, it was Nunez!
What about the girl who was with him?
[Her sister shoots Delgado in the balls]
